sign_in_subtitle: Saina kuti uenderere mberi uchienda kuGigafaucet
forgot_password_coming_soon: Wakanganwa password kushanda kuri kuuya munguva pfupi!
sign_up_coming_soon: Sign up functionality iri kuuya munguva pfupi!
google_login_coming_soon: Kupinda paGoogle kuri kuuya munguva pfupi!
password_min_length: Password inofanira kunge yakareba mavara angangoita {0}
password_must_contain_uppercase: Password inofanira kunge iine vara guru rimwe chete
password_must_contain_lowercase: Password inofanira kunge iine vara diki rimwe chete
password_must_contain_number: Password inofanira kunge iine nhamba imwe chete kana kupfuura
create_account_subtitle: Zadza ruzivo rwuri pazasi kuti ugadzire account yako
forgot_password_subtitle: Isa email yako uye tichakutumira chinongedzo chekuseta patsva password yako.
forgot_password_subtitle_sent: Tatumira link yekugadzirisa password ku email address yenyu. Ndapota tarisai inbox yenyu motevera mirairo yacho.
check_email_for_reset: Tarisa email yako kune reset link
join_thousands: Joinha zviuru zvevashandisi vari kutowana Bitcoin yemahara
hero_main_heading: Shandura nguva yako yemahara kuita Bitcoin yemahara
paying_since_2018: Kubhadhara mari ye crypto yemahara kubvira 2018.
how_it_works_heading: Tanga kuwana yemahara crypto mukati memaminitsi!
choose_offer_desc: Tora sarudzo yako kubva kumabasa ari papeji yekuwana. Isu tinonyora zvakanakisa zvinopihwa kubva kumakambani anoda kushambadza maapplication avo, ongororo, uye zvigadzirwa.
complete_offer_desc: Zvizhinji zvinopihwa zviri nyore uye zvakatowana mari kune zviuru zvevanhu. Vazhinji vanopa kubhadhara mibairo yavo yekutanga mukati memaminitsi mashoma.
get_paid_instantly_desc: Kana yangosimbiswa, mihoro yako inowedzerwa kuaccount yako ipapo ipapo. Bvisa kuburikidza neBitcoin, LiteCoin, Doge kana Dash.
level_up_desc: Kukwira mitsara. Vhura mibairo ye crypto. Kubva kuHodler kuenda kuCryptolord, iwe uchawana ma spins, anosimudzira, uye nezvimwe.
avg_cashout_month: Avg. mari kune vashandisi vatsva mwedzi uno.
delete_account_confirmation_message: Une chokwadi chekuti unoda kudzima account yako zvachose? Ichi chiito hachigone kuregererwa uye data rako rese richabviswa zvachose.
delete_account_warning: [Yambiro:] Izvi zvichabvisa zvachose data rako rese kusanganisira chimiro, mihoro, uye nhoroondo yekutengeserana.
failed_to_delete_account: Watadza kudzima account. Ndapota edza zvakare.
verify_delete_account_description: Tatumira kodhi ine manhamba ekuongorora kukero yako yeemail. Ndokumbira uise kodhi iri pazasi kuti upedze kudzima account.
verification_code_must_be_4_digits: Kodhi yekuongorora inofanirwa kunge iine manhamba chaiwo
offer_token_note: Usagovane chiratidzo ichi nemunhu. Rutsigiro haruzombokukumbire.
verification_description: Tatumira kodhi ine manhamba ekuongorora ku
verification_failed: Kodhi yekusimbisa isiriyo. Ndapota edza zvakare.
resend_failed: Tatadza kutumirazve kodhi yekuongorora. Ndapota edza zvakare.
verification_required_message: Akaundi yako inoda kuongororwa usati wapinda. Tichakutumira kodhi yekuongorora kukero yako yeemail.
password_requirements: Pasiwedhi rinofanirwa kunge riine mabhii masere kureba
password_reset_successful: Password reset zvinobudirira! Ndokumbira upinde nepassword yako itsva.
password_min_8_chars: Pasiwedhi rinofanirwa kunge riine mabhii masere kureba
contact_us_description: Tinoda kunzwa kubva kwamuri. Titumirei meseji uye tichapindura nekukasika.
name: Zita
subject: Chidzidzo
message_too_short: Mharidzo inofanira kunge yakareba mavara gumi kana kupfuura
response_time_description: Isu tinopindura mukati memaawa makumi maviri nemana
user_info_description: Iyi widget inoratidza ruzivo rwechokwadi rwemushandisi kubva kuwhoomi API. Iyo inobata otomatiki kurodha nyika, kukanganisa kubata, uye inogona kubatanidzwa zviri nyore mune chero skrini.
compact_description: Minima padding uye tsika yekushongedza yesidebar kana dhirowa kushandiswa.
custom_description: Tsika gradient kumashure inoenderana neapp theme.
import_widget: Ngenisa iyo UserInfoWidget mune yako peji kana skrini.
add_widget: Wedzera widget kumuti wewidget yako nemagadzirirwo aunoda.
customize_styling: Gadzirisa masitaera uchishandisa kushongedza uye padding zvivakwa.
handle_states: Iyo widget inobata otomatiki kurodha, kukanganisa, uye nyika isina chinhu.
level_rewards_subtitle: Simudza kumusoro sezvaunowana & kuvhura mibairo mitsva.
level_rewards_points_description: 250 mapoinzi kune inotevera nhanho. Iwe unowana 1 poindi pagumi rega rega Mari inowanikwa.
level_progress_description: 250 mapoinzi kune inotevera nhanho. Iwe unowana 1 poindi pagumi rega rega Mari inowanikwa.
profile_2fa_description: Taona kuti hauna mbiri-factor authentication yakagoneswa. Isu tinokurudzira kuti ugonese 2FA kuchengetedza account yako yakachengeteka.
profile_username_note: Zita rako rekushandisa rinogona kuchinjwa kamwe chete mazuva makumi matatu.
profile_interest_description: Akaunti yako ichawana 5% mubereko kana iwe uine anopfuura zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu eCoin. Mbereko inobhadharwa svondo rega rega.
security_enable_2fa_desc: Kodhi ichatumirwa kuemail yako pese paunopinda uchishandisa mudziyo mutsva.
security_enable_pin_desc: Iwe unozofanirwa kuisa mana mana pini kodhi paunenge uchisimbisa zviito zvakakosha.
security_2fa_app_desc: Zviviri-zvinhu zvekusimbisa authenticator maapplication anowedzera imwe chengetedzo kuaccount yako. Paunopinda pachinhu chitsva iwe uchafanirwa kuisa nguva inonzwa 6 manhamba kodhi.
2fa_unknown_device_subtitle: Taona kuti urikupinda kubva kune imwe mudziyo usingazivikanwe.
2fa_instruction: Ndokumbira uise kodhi yechengetedzo kubva kune yako authenticator app.
2fa_support_text: Kana iwe usina kodhi yako yekuchengetedza, ndapota
turnstile_token_missing: Chengetedzo yekuongorora tokeni haipo. Ndapota edza zvakare.
2fa_dialog_body_text: Uchishandisa app yechokwadi seGoogle Authenticator, Microsoft Authenticator, Authy, kana 1Password, tarisa QR kodhi. Ichagadzira 6 manhamba kodhi yekuti iwe uise pazasi.
2fa_dialog_note_text: Kana uine dambudziko rekushandisa iyo QR kodhi, sarudza manyore ekupinda paapp yako, uye isa zita rako rekushandisa nekodhi:
setup_2fa_instructions: Gadzirisa zvinhu zviviri-zvechokwadi kuchengetedza account yako
2fa_enabled_desc: Akaunti yako yakachengetedzwa ne two-factor authentication. Uchafanirwa kuisa kodhi ine manhamba mana paunenge uchipinda kubva kumidziyo mitsva.
2fa_disabled_desc: Shandisa nzira mbiri dzekusimbisa kuti account yako ive yakachengeteka. Uchafanira kuisa kodhi ine manhamba mana inoteerera nguva paunenge uchipinda.
2fa_initial_desc: Tarisa yako-mbiri-chinhu chechokwadi chimiro kuti uone kana account yako yakadzivirirwa nekuwedzera kwekuchengetedza.
check_2fa_status_description: Tarisa yako 2FA mamiriro kuti uone kana account yako yakachengetedzwa
disable_2fa_warning_message: Kudzima mbiri-zvinhu kuvimbiswa kuchaita kuti account yako isachengeteke. Une chokwadi chekuti unoda kuenderera mberi here?
disable_2fa_security_note: Akaunti yako inochengetedzwa chete nepassword yako.
2fa_login_verification_subtitle: Isa kodhi ine manhamba mana kubva kuapp yako yekuvimbisa kuti upedzise kupinda kwako.
2fa_login_info: Vhura app yako yechokwadi kuti uwane iyo kodhi.
welcome_description:
Pedzisa chidzidzo chipfupi ichi kuti uwane yakakosha yekugamuchira tutori bhonasi.

Zvichangotora miniti!
free_spins_description:
Zuva rega rega kana svondo raunopinda, account yako ichapihwa zuva nezuva 'Mahara Spins' uye vhiki nevhiki 'Mystery Boxes'.

Nhamba yaunogamuchira inoenderana neakaundi yako level.
daily_streak_description:
Zuva rega rega iwe paunopinda uye unowana shoma nhamba yeMari, unogona kutora yako yemazuva ese streak.

Iyo yakawanda mazuva akateedzana iwe yaunotora yako streak, iyo yakakura mubairo!

Yepamusoro account nhanho zvakare inowana mibairo mikuru.
ptc_ads_description:
Wona PTC Ads yekukurumidza, pfupi ads kuti uwedzere yako yemazuva ese Coin yakazara.

Iyo shambadziro ichavhura mune nyowani tebhu, saka ita shuwa kuti inoramba yakavhurika kusvika timer yapera!
missions_description:
Iwe uchawana mazana emamishoni uye mishoni yekupedzisa muchikamu che'Misheni' chewebhusaiti.

Kupedza mishoni uye maquests inzira huru yekuwana bhonasi Mari.

Tarisa iyo Mubayiro → 'Bonus Missions' peji kuti uwane ruzivo.
offers_description:
Kuzadzisa zvinopihwa ndiyo imwe yedzakanakisa nzira dzekuwana Mari paGigaFaucet.

Zvipo zvinogona kuwanikwa muchikamu che'Muhoro' chewebhusaiti.

Kune akawanda akasiyana marudzi ezvipo zviripo. Iva nechokwadi chekuvatarisa kune avo vanokuitira zvakakunakira.
xp_description:
Pese paunopedza kupihwa, ridza iyo inowedzeredza, kana kuona vhidhiyo, nezvimwe, iwe unozowana XP (Zvakaitika Mapoinzi).

Kuwana XP kunokwidza account yako, kuvhura mamwe maficha uye mibairo mikuru.

Iwe unogona kuwana yako account level pane yako Profile kana Bonuses peji.
withdraw_description:
Unogona kubvisa ma Coins ako kana warova shoma shoma ye30,000 Coins.

Kuti ubvise, enda kuAkaundi → 'Cash Out' uye sarudza nzira yaunofarira yekubvisa.

Tevera mirairo kuti upedze kubvisa kwako.
all_set_description:
Iwe zvino wagadzirira kutanga kuwana Mari paGigaFaucet!

Rangarira kutarisa kumashure zuva nezuva kune ako mabhonasi spins uye zvakavanzika mabhokisi, uye zvizere zvinopihwa uye mishoni kuti uwedzere mihoro yako.

Rombo rakanaka uye unakirwe!
tutorial_reward_desc: Mhosva 3 Bonus Spins uye 2 Chakavanzika Mabhokisi
referrals_manage_desc: Govera GigaFaucet neshamwari dzako nemhuri kuti uwane mari inosvika makumi maviri neshanu muzana pane yega yega inotumirwa.
referrals_manage_help: Kana uine chero mibvunzo, ndapota shanyira peji redu reRubatsiro.
referrals_link_desc: Govera chinongedzo chako pasocial media, blogs, kana PTC mawebhusaiti etc. Chero vashandisi vanosaina kuburikidza nelink yako vanokuwanira mari!
referrals_leaderboard_desc: Iyo leaderboard inovandudzwa maminitsi gumi nemashanu.
referrals_details_desc: Referral makwikwi anoitwa mwedzi wega wega uye anobhadharwa kupera kwemwedzi wega wega. Wana zvinyowani kune wega wega anotumirwa mushandisi.
referral_get_started_desc: Ingo tumira vashandisi kuGigaFaucet uchishandisa yako tsika yekutumira link. Ivo vanozoongororwa otomatiki uye kuverengerwa kwauri kana vakasaina chero nguva mukati memazuva makumi matatu.
referral_point_1: Iwe uchawana 25% yezvese zvinotumirwa faucet zvichemo zveHUPENYU.
referral_point_2: Iwe uchawanawo 10% yechero mari yaunowana kubva kune vanokutumira.
referral_point_3: Iko hakuna muganho kune nhamba yekutumira iwe yaunogona kutumira.
referral_point_4: Mareferensi pamudziyo mumwe chete kana mumhuri imwechete HAZVIBVHUDZWE uye hazviverengwe sekutumira.
referral_warning: ZVINOKOSHA: Zvisizvo, zvekunyepa kana zvakapetwa zvakatumirwa hazviverengwe. Akaunti yako inogona kumiswa uye maCoin ese otorerwa kana ukaonekwa kuti uri kutumira zvisizvo.
referral_banner_note: Dzvanya kuti ukope kodhi uye shandisa mabhena aya pawebhusaiti yako kana blog kuti utore vanhu vanokutaurira.
referral_get_started_warning: ZVINOKOSHA: Zvisizvo, zvenhema kana zvakapetwa zvakatumirwa hazviverengwe. Akaunti yako inogona kumiswa uye maCoin ese otorerwa kana ukaonekwa kuti uri kutumira zvisizvo. Tine otomatiki matanho ekuona nekudzivirira kutumirwa kusiri iko. Iwe wakanyeverwa.
coins_history_title: Mari Yekupedzisira Yakaitwa Nhoroondo. Mazuva {day} apfuura
join_crypto_event_description_widget_tex:
Wana, tamba, uye unganidza mibairo zuva rega rega kuburikidza nezviitiko zvakasarudzika, mabhonasi anotevedzana,
uye makwikwi emunharaunda.
event_invite_friends_win_coins: Koka shamwari dzako uye uwane mari yehupenyu hwese!
change_your_country_description: Sarudza nyika yaunogara. Zvipo zviripo kwauri zvinoenderana nenyika ino.
change_your_language_note: Kusandura mutauro wako kunogadzirisa iyo app interface yese.
offer_token_description: Ndiyo yako yekupa Mushandisi ID, yaungashandisa kubata Offerwall kugadzirisa nyaya dzako dzekupa.
upload_new_avatar_desc: Mufananidzo unofanirwa kunge uri muPNG kana JPEG fomati uye haufanire kudarika 1MB muhukuru
reward_description_prefix: Simudza kumusoro sezvaunowana & kuvhura mibairo mitsva. Iwe unowana 1XP poindi yega yega
change_your_email_description: Iwe uchagamuchira kodhi neemail yekusimbisa yako email kero itsva.
change_your_email_success: Email yako yachinjwa zvinobudirira. Kodhi yekusimbisa yatumirwa kune email yako itsva.
new_email_same_as_current: Nyowani email inofanira kunge yakasiyana neyezvino email
change_your_country_note: Iwe unogona kushandura nyika yako chete katatu pagore.
setup_2fa_app_description: Shandisa app yekuvimbisa se [Google Authenticator, Microsoft Authenticator, Authy] kana [1Password]. Skena QR code iri pazasi. Ichagadzira kodhi ine manhamba mana kuti uise pazasi.
setup_2fa_app_note: Kana iwe uchinetseka kuongorora iyo QR kodhi, sarudza yekunyora mune yako authenticator app uye isa zita rako rekushandisa uye inotevera kodhi:
failed_to_change_name: Tatadza kushandura zita. Ndapota edza zvakare.
name_unchanged: Zita idzva rakafanana nezita rako razvino
name_too_short: Zita rinofanira kunge riine mavara maviri
name_too_long: Zita harifanire kudarika mavara makumi mashanu
password_too_short: Password inofanira kunge iine mavara masere
password_changed_successfully: Password yakagadziridzwa. Ndokumbira upinde zvakare nepassword yako itsva.
failed_to_change_password: Tatadza kushandura password. Ndapota edza zvakare.
twofa_description: Mapurogiramu ekusimbisa zvinhu zviviri anowedzera kuchengetedzeka kuaccount yako. Paunopinda uchishandisa mudziyo mutsva, uchafanirwa kuisa kodhi ine manhamba mana inoteerera nguva.
security_pin_description: Iwe unozofanirwa kuisa 4-manhamba PIN kodhi paunenge uchisimbisa zviito zvakakosha.
security_pin_length_error: PIN inofanirwa kunge iine manhamba chaiwo
failed_to_enable_security_pin: Yatadza kugonesa PIN yekuchengetedza. Ndapota edza zvakare.
enable_security_pin_note: Shandisa yako 4-manhamba yekuchengetedza PIN kuratidza yakakosha zviito zveakaundi.
notifications_description: Bvumira zviziviso kuti ugamuchire zviziviso nezvenyaya dzakakosha
show_stats_description: Kana yagoneswa, nhamba dzeakaundi yako dzinoratidzwa paprofile yako. Inogoneswa ne default.
anonymous_contests_description: Kana yagoneswa, account yako inoonekwa isingazivikanwe mumakwikwi. Off by default.
delete_account_description: Kudzima account yako ndeye zvachose. Mibairo yako, mari nekutumira zvicharasika zvachose.
country_not_changed_error: Nyika yakasarudzwa yakafanana nenyika yauri ikozvino
delete_confirmation_description: Wagamuchira kodhi ine manhamba matanhatu yekusimbisa kubviswa kweakaundi yako.
enter_delete_confirmation_code: Isa kodhi yekusimbisa ine manhamba mana
interest_notification_description: Chengetedza mari inokwana {0} kuti uwane {1}% mhindu. Mbereko inobhadharwa svondo rega rega. Batidza muzvirongwa zvako.
balances_update_info: Masara anovandudzwa pamaminitsi {0} ega ega. Nhoroondo inongogumira mazuva {1}.
enter_2fa_code_from_app: Isa kodhi yako ine manhamba mana kubva kuapp yekuvimbisa
please_enter_2fa_code: Ndapota isa kodhi ine manhamba mana
code_must_be_exactly_6_digits: Kodhi inofanira kunge ine manhamba matanhatu chaiwo
code_must_be_numbers_only: Kodhi inofanira kunge iine nhamba chete
affiliate_program_description: Wana mubairo wehupenyu hwese wakakwira ne {0}% kana ukakoka vanhu vatsva
referral_bonus_message: Tora bhonasi yako YEMAHARA - kusvika kumadhora mazana mashanu!
logout_description: Une chokwadi chekuti unoda kubuda here?
